author: markphip
msg: JavaHL: Follow up to r30304: formatting cleanups.  Converted tabs
to spaces and added JavaDoc to new methods.  No code changes.

author: markphip
msg: JavaHL: Follow up to r30304: fix a test failure.  The test was trying something
that is not supported by the API.  Namely, svn mergeinfo SOURCE-URL TARGET-URL.
It appears that TARGET must always be a WC path.
(testBasicMerge): Remove the test of mergeinfo retrieval against a URL.

author: epg
msg: Don't discard wrapped abort_edit in cancellation editor.
This bug has always been here; no need to hold the release for it.
